channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2021-35134|2024-08-04T00:33:51.174Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20industrial%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Due to insufficient validation of ELF headers, an Incorrect Calculation of Buffer Size can occur in Boot leading to memory corruption in Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2021-35133|2024-08-04T00:33:51.177Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20industrial%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Use after free in the synx driver issue while performing other functions during multiple invocation of synx release calls in Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile
